## üìù Content Integrity Checklist (MANDATORY)

You must check **all** boxes below.

- [ ] I wrote all text **in my own words**
- [ ] I did **not** copy or paraphrase articles verbatim
- [ ] Any quotes are **short** and clearly attributed
- [ ] I included **source links** for every factual claim
- [ ] I did **not** upload or re-host images, videos, or PDFs
- [ ] All media references are **links or embeds only**
- [ ] This PR contains **facts, not opinions or calls to action**
